tool_description: Use this API to specify containers and items to pack within those containers. Intended to be a quick and easy bin packing API.
name: Bin Packer
title: Bin Packer

api_list.name: pack
api_list.description:
Specify boxes and items to pack within the boxes and get a result of which items can go within which boxes. 

Intended to be a quick and easy bin packing API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bin-packer.p.rapidapi.com/pack"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bin-packer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bin-packer.p.rapidapi.com/pack"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bin-packer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
